channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Genie WP Favicon
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Genie WP Favicon

item.title: CVE-2021-24674|2024-08-03T19:42:16.064Z -- unknown -- genie%20wp%20favicon
item.description: The Genie WP Favicon WordPress plugin through 0.5.2 does not have CSRF in place when updating the favicon, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change it via a CSRF attack
